oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON THE INSTABILITY OF TRIVIAL SOLUTIONS OF A CLASS OF 8TH-ORDER DIFFERENTIAL-EQUATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BEREKETOGLU, H
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The object of this paper is to investigate sufficient conditions for the instability of the trivial solution, x = 0, of an eighth-order differential equation of the type given by eqn. (1.1) below.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF PURE & APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 22(3), 199-202
